name: Levni Hotel & Spa

reviews.text: We stated here for 2 nights prior to joining a cruise.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel in excellent location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On arrival we received a very warm welcome from all the staff. This warmth and friendliness continued throughout the stay.
reviews.title: A Perfect Stay

reviews.text: Our room was 1401- a standard room overlooking the rear of the hotel. The room was very comfortable and beautifully appointed.
reviews.title: Everything was perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Previous reviews have mentioned the construction going on by the hotel. (The construction is a new metro station which will make the hotel's location even more attractive in the future) Yes it's there and there is some noise. However, the centre of Istanbul seems to have construction on every street, and the chances are, if you're not disturbed by construction, you'll be disturbed by the traffic and other noises associated with a bustling city centre.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel's location within walking distance of the Blue Mosque, The Grand Bazzar, San Sophia, Topkapi, The Spice Market, The Galata Bridge & Tower and the Tunel neighbourhood makes it an ideal base in the city.
reviews.title: I had an amazing time in this hotel!

reviews.text: spent 5 days at levni. it is a small, boutique hotel but it has it all. pool, sauna, gym, hamam.
reviews.title: brilliant hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: evrything was excellent, room was beautiful (check out my pics) , jacuzzi in the room was fab- much needed after a long day touring the sites. Also our room had a breath taking view of the sea and topkapi palace. Location is brilliant - can walk to most sites. we did istanbul on foot and only had to take a taxi once.
reviews.title: A little treasure in Istanbul

reviews.text: staff were very friendly and went out of their way to help you especially the guys at reception who were always smiling and very welcoming.
reviews.title: Amazing Vacation in Istanbul

reviews.text: there is construction work outside the hotel but it didnt put us off.
reviews.title: Great location! Great hotel! Great staff!

reviews.text: would return again.
reviews.title: The staff went above and beyond

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for three night in August 2013. The hotel is extrememly well situated for the major sites. The rooms are very well set out and the bathrooms are stylish with excellent showers. The spa is impressive and the staff are very professional both there and in the hotel. The hotel layout is a tad strange but arises from it being built across two buildings and is not an issue at all. The breakfast menu is vast (although no cooked breakfasts apart from deliicous omelettes, for obvious reasons). I would recommend thoroughly. R
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed there with my partner in 2012 October for 3 nights.
reviews.title: Fantastic 3 nights in Istanbul

reviews.text: To get to the hotel we took one of the shuttle buses from the airport to Taksim. Then took a taxi to the hotel. It was 10-15 minutes from Taksim. There are plenty of one-way streets so the driver struggled to find it. The hotel is literally walking distance from most interesting places. I really can not think of a more convenient location for a visit to the 'old city'. But be prepared to be waken by the prayer from the nearby mosque at 4 am :)
reviews.title: Perfect location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were very clean and comfortable.
reviews.title: Great place, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were very friendly and professional. They were helpful with where to go in what order to avoid traffic etc.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.text: The Levni Hotel in Istanbul is very nice. It is situated central in the old part of the city. The rooms are very clean and have nice and comfortable furniture. I slept very good there. They have a luxury Spa area and good offers for massage and hamam treatments. I didn't have had dinner there, but the breakfast was delicious and they offered a lot of different things. Everybody was very friendly, helpful and very kind. I felt very good treated, they cared of me and I felt like in family. On my next visit to Istanbul I'll stay again in this Hotel. If you are planing a trip to Istanbul I can really recommand this hotel.
reviews.title: Total schönes Hotel / Very nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Das Levni Hotel in Istanbul ist total schön. Es ist zentral gelegen in der Altstadt Istanbuls. Die Zimmer sind sehr sauber und exclusiv und komfortabel eingerichtet. Ich habe super dort geschladen. Der luxuriöse Spabereich ist wirklich erholsam und auch die Massagen und Hamam-Behandlungen kann ich nur empfehlen, die haben auch immer tolle Angebote für die Behandlungen. Leider habe ich dort nicht zu Abend gegessen, aber das Frühstück war sehr lecker. Das Personal war total nett und hilfsbereit, ich habe mich wie daheim gefühlt, man hat sich super um mich bemüht und gekümmert. Bei meinem nächsten Besuch in Istanbul werde ich auf jeden Fall wieder dort übernachten. Ich kann das Hotel nur weiterempfehlen.
reviews.title: We loved the Levni Hotel so much that we came back

reviews.text: During our 2 weeks in Turkey, the Levni Hotel was the best hotel we stayed at. In fact, after touring the west coast of Turkey, we returned to Istanbul and stayed at the Levni again. Here are some highlights:
reviews.title: Even beter with the new address

reviews.text: -great price value for $160+ night
reviews.title: Good value, nice place for a family stay

reviews.text: -rooms are clean, comfy and spacious
reviews.title: Istanbul, Turkey, Aug 10-13, 2013

description: Levni Hotel & Spa Old City is a special category (5 star category) hotel located in Sirkeci Istanbul within 5 min. walking distance to many museums and palaces - Topkapi Palace, Santa Sophia, Blue Mosque, Basilica cistern. All rooms are decorated in modern style. 1 suite and 30 deluxe rooms , 5 Excecutive rooms with jacuzzi some with a very nice Bosporus Sea view. SPA center is avaiable with an indoor pool, sauna, Turkish bath and gym. there are 3 therapy rooms including one for couple massages. Rich Open buffet in the Gourme Restaurant, which has a capacity of 100 pax also terrace cafe is avaiable. There are 2 meeting rooms with 100 pax and 30 pax capacity connected to each other with a lounge and one exclusive VIP room with capacity upto 12 pax. our business center is avaiable with free internet and printing services nex to meeting rooms.
